Sequence Information.Family: Belongs to the lantibiotic family (Class I bacteriocin)
Sequence Information.Target Organism: Gram-positive bacteria:Bacillus megaterium AS1.941 (IZ=14 mm), Bacillus subtilis AS1.1087 (IZ=12 mm), Lactobacillus curvatus LTH1174 (IZ=13 mm), Leuconostoc mesenteroides AS1.2 (IZ=10 mm), Leuconostoc dextranicum 181 (IZ=13 mm), Micrococcus flavus NCIB8166 (IZ=21 mm).NOTE:IZ = zone of inhibition.
Sequence Information.Hemolytic Activity: No hemolysis information or data found in the reference(s) presented in this entry
Sequence Information.PTM: There are two thioether rings (T8-C13 and T10-C32) and one unique disulfide bridge between C21-C29.

Literature.Title: Bovicin HJ50, a novel lantibiotic produced by Streptococcus bovis HJ50.
Literature.Author: Xiao H, Chen X, Chen M, Tang S, Zhao X, Huan L.

Literature.Title: Characteristics of the bovicin HJ50 gene cluster in Streptococcus bovis HJ50.
Literature.Author: Liu G, Zhong J, Ni J, Chen M, Xiao H, Huan L.
